column3: Concept ACK, I like how this provides the help text in comments instead of in-line, making it harder to have it accidentally end up in the issue text itself.\n

Concept ACK.
Could the legacy `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md` be removed at all?

![Screenshot from 2019-09-09 13-38-12](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/64524401-18740800-d307-11e9-9be6-314dcc940a3e.png)

>  Could the legacy .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md be removed at all?\n\nWhy? It doesn't cause any harm and it mentions useful advice for non-bug-reports (e.g. that support requests should go to stackexchange)
```\nGUI-related issue? What is your operation system and its version? If Linux, what is your desktop environment and graphical shell?\n```
I think it is fine as is
These `<!--- ` could be explained as a leading MD `- `, but don't look great in the issue preview plaintext and never get rendered as Markdown. Maybe instead add a `:` e.g. `Describe the issue:`?
I think it is fine to keep this as it was previously
This is take from the "official" GitHub template, so I am leaving it for now (unless there is other stuff to fix up)
